issues.description: The template defines addGuestStudents with signature addGuestStudents(int, boolean), but the problem statement and solution expect addGuestStudents(int) only. This mismatch prevents students from implementing the required method signature and will cause test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Remove the boolean parameter from the template’s addGuestStudents stub so it reads public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents), matching the problem description and solution implementation.

issues.description: The template stub defines addGuestStudents with two parameters (int numberOfNewGuestStudents, boolean validateInput), but both the problem statement and the solution implementation expect a single-parameter method addGuestStudents(int). This signature mismatch will confuse students and cause compilation or test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template’s addGuestStudents method signature to public void addGuestStudents(int numberOfNewGuestStudents), removing the boolean parameter to align with the problem statement and solution.
